body:
Well, how can I say this?

Nine months into my ban, I appealed. I'm not unbanned fully at the moment, but my ban will end a few days into June.

For those who don't know me, I'm Ben. Also called xBen_. I'm 12 years old and I'm from Australia. I love Avicus, and played it mostly for the months of April-September 2015. I was banned on the 10th of September for Swearing and Rudeness and on the 23rd for ban evading. On the 30th of April, I appealed and my appeal got accepted and reverted to a temp-ban.

Since this is also an AMA, ask away.
body_tagged:

title: Unbanned + AMA (xBen_)

replies.body:
Wait you were banned? I thought you just disappeared randomly :/. Well, good luck on your unban, you will probably remember me as SweggyJunyaBae. Hope to see back soon!
-Do you miss Avicus?
-Who's your favorite singer?
- What grade are you in?

Welcome back!

Was it good to be away from Avicus for a while?

Enjoying the new Avicus drama?

Opinions on me?

replies.body:
@Budah Who's that?

@Rilo Omg yessss

@Blaze Thank you <3 (Yeah, I remember you)

@Emily Thank you <3

@Frozen

Was it good to be away from Avi for a while? I don't know, mixed feelings, It was nice to be away from an addiction, but at the same time I wanted it back.

Enjoying the new Avicus drama? What drama?

Opinions on you? Funny, kind, good all-rounder and awesome at clicking (I've nearly beaten that record).
